table.name: voyloc
table.description: This table defines the individual locations within the voyage path. Each location can be a Pickup or Delivery point, identified by a 'D' for Pickup and 'A' for Delivery in the database.

columns.name: SEQ_NO
columns.description: The sequence number for the location of the voyage.

columns.name: LOCATION_GID
columns.description: The GID for the location of the voyage.

columns.name: D_OR_A
columns.description: Defines whether the location is a pickup (D) or delivery (A) point for the voyage.

columns.name: D_OR_A_DATE
columns.description: The date for the pickup (D) or delivery (A) for the voyage.

columns.name: ESTIMATED_D_OR_A_DATE
columns.description: The estimated date at port sometimes sent by a carrier.

columns.name: ACTUAL_D_OR_A_DATE
columns.description: The actual date at port sometimes sent by carrier.

columns.name: DATA_SOURCE_PARTITION_KEY
columns.description: Partition key used to parse the data based on the data source.

columns.name: DOMAIN_NAME
columns.description: Database domain where this data is stored.

columns.name: INSERT_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data insert user.

columns.name: INSERT_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of data insert.

columns.name: UPDATE_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data update user.

columns.name: UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of the most recent data update.

columns.name: IS_TRANSLOAD
columns.description: For composite voyages. The transload point check box identifies the transload port in the rotation. The Transload check box is used by OTM to indicate a transload stop (the stop type will be 'T' for transload.)

columns.name: VOYAGE_SERVICE_TYPE_GID
columns.description: The GID for the voyage service type. The Voyage Service Type ID field is the voyage service type of the operator of the leg. It is a validated field but is only used for information and documentation. The Voyage Service Type ID on the header is operational and used to link the voyage to the rate service. The voyage service type of the mother vessel should be the voyage service type on the header.

columns.name: VOYAGE_DESCRIPTION
columns.description: The Voyage Description field is the voyage of the operator of the leg. This is for information only and is not a validated field.

columns.name: VESSEL_DESCRIPTION
columns.description: The Vessel Description field is for further information about the vessel for the leg. It is for information only.

columns.name: IS_MOTHER_VESSEL
columns.description: You can select the Mother check box to indicate that this is the mother vessel or 'vessel of record' for the leg for customs.
